name: Theta vs Pi 7
description:
Theta vs Pi 7 is the game where you get to play as the Greek letter Theta in a traditional side-scrolling/sometimes vertically-scrolling platformer (as you've always wanted to).

Play 49 levels across 7 lands.

Wear a wizard hat and teleport yourself.

Fly through the sky in an egg cup..

Celebrate completing levels with a brief musical performance.

In all seriousness, it's really just a fairly basic game with graphics done in Paint which is my first go at making a game of this size. I hope you'll enjoy it.

Keep in mind it's a relatively new release so there may be bugs yet to be identified. If a level ever gets too hard then there will be a file of cheats in your computer's Start Menu you can use.
